solution_line_template: John received twice as many points as Hunter, who received a {Hunter_score} so John scored {multiplier_for_twice}*{Hunter_score} = <<{multiplier_for_twice}*{Hunter_score}={John_score}>>{John_score} on his test

Grants scored {grant_higher_than_john} more points than John who got a {John_score} so Grant received {grant_higher_than_john}+{John_score} = <<{grant_higher_than_john}+{John_score}={Grant_score}>>{Grant_score} on his test
